posts.post_content:
Looking to make some strides in my 250 card Polar Bear set. Scans a must, and PayPal is ready!

PMs or email to [url]jrlebert@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
Figured I would get this back up and running. Looking for decently conditioned raw Polar Bears I do not have on my way to 250!

Tom has some raw ones for sale at this link. [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=244100"]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=244100[/URL]
I'm down to needing 10 more Polar Bears and then I might start upgrading some. It's a fun subset to collect and can be completed with some patience and effort.

[quote name="Ronnie73" post=1698177]Tom has some raw ones for sale at this link. [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=244100"]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=244100[/URL]
I'm down to needing 10 more Polar Bears and then I might start upgrading some. It's a fun subset to collect and can be completed with some patience and effort.[/QUOTE]

Thanks. I actually purchased a few from him last week and got them in the mail already. I am just about 30% of the way through myself. Picking up one or two a month, as I am pretty picky on condition, etc. 

If you ever have any available, please let me know, and I am more than happy to do the same!

J.R.
